help.title: help
help.description:
this is quiz chat bot escho! answer question by click alphabet emoji below the question.

all command start with `/`. when use in group channel, need add prefix `@escho#1145`. for example, you can show your status to other in **qa-quiz** by send `@escho#1145 /status` in qa-quiz channel.

fields.name: /start
fields.value: regist by discord id and start QA quiz in private channel. after start, bot will send your status. you shoud notice wether that status is your status or not, then regist new one by specify new id by `/start your-new-id. (following command)

fields.name: /start alice
fields.value: regist as alice and start answer question.

fields.name: /next
fields.value: ask for next question, previous question still would show up future.
